Plot: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.
Title: The Diving Bell and the Butterfly
Actors: Mathieu Amalric, Emmanuelle Seigner, Marie-Josée Croze, Anne Consigny
tomatoConsensus: Breathtaking visuals and dynamic performances make The Diving Bell and the Butterfly a powerful biopic.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 66 wins & 91 nominations.
